What's Binance.US?

Binance.US is the United States-regulated arm of Binance, specifically designed for U.S. residents. It provides a secure and compliant platform for trading cryptocurrencies with features including:

  • Regulated cryptocurrency trading for U.S. residents
  • Competitive trading fees
  • Secure API integration for automated trading
  • Compliance with U.S. regulations and requirements

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning="Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials." %}

1 Create a Binance.US Account

If you don’t already have a Binance.US account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your Binance.US account.
  2. Click your Email/Username at the top-right corner.
  3. Select "API Management" from the dropdown menu.

3 Generate an API Key

  1. Enter a name for your key.
  2. click "Create API".

4 Configure Security Settings

  1. Click "Edit restrictions."
  2. Enable "Restrict access to trusted IPs only" and add your server’s IP address.
  3. Enable "Spot Trading."
  4. Copy your API keys and then click "Save."

IMPORTANT: Ensure you copy your secret key before saving changes.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Binance account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
